content:
I am working on FHIR and implemented patient resource now i want to send HIV ORDER to some other organization. Which resource i have to use
1. ServiceRequest
2. DiagnosticOrder
3. CarePlan
andy code example
@muhammad arshad would you please elaborate what do you mean by HIV ORDER?

Actually i want to implement laboratory workflow for shaukat khanum hospital and don't know what type of orders i will send to other laboratories and how laboratories will response results to our organization. for example i want to send Complete blood count order to Agha Khan and Agha khan will send results back to us after performing.

@muhammad arshad So, you are saying one person came and appeared for a medical test in a laboratory. Now you have to outsource the sample of that person to some other organization and get results back? am I understood correctly?

And you have to know

1. Which resource you'll use for sending your sample request?

2. Which resource you'll use for getting the result back?

am I right?

@muhammad arshad have you achieved your desired outcome?

I think ServiceRequest resource served the purpose for you?
